duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and attract top talent through various channels and techniques, including cold-calling, referrals, and online research.
Build and maintain professional relationships with both clients and candidates, ensuring exceptional client delivery and candidate interaction.
Utilize internet research tools and databases to source candidates and gather market intelligence.
Effectively communicate with candidates and decision-makers at the executive level, persuading and influencing them in the recruitment process.
Manage a full cycle recruiting process, from sourcing to client delivery, with a focus on excellent relationship building and negotiation skills.
Conduct market analysis, staying informed of industry trends and competitor activity to identify and capitalize on growth opportunities.
Provide ongoing community outreach and develop national partnerships to build a strong network of professional relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
